hero.title: About Lead Awaker

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To revolutionize how businesses reconnect with their leads by providing AI that feels human, builds trust, and delivers real results.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.desc: Every conversation sounds natural, empathetic, and genuinely helpful.

results.title: Results-Driven

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.desc: We align our success with yours through performance-based pricing.

cta.heading: Ready to wake up your leads?
